Trade/Device Name(s): X100 with Full Field Peripheral Blood Smear Application
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Full Field Peripheral Blood Smear Application
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Scopio Labs X100 with Full Field Peripheral Blood Smear Application, an automated digital imaging system for blood smear evaluation.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to locate and display images of white cells, red cells, and platelets from fixed and stained peripheral blood smears to assist technologists with WBC differential, RBC morphology, and platelet estimation for in vitro diagnostic use.
